alert.note: Alert for Pike; Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:25AM EDT until August 26 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT/245 AM EDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN WARRICK...NORTHERN SPENCER AND SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 124 AM CDT/224 AM EDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Folsomville, or 9 miles northeast of Boonville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dale, Santa Claus, Folsomville, Tennyson and Gentryville. This includes Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 41 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
